0.1.name: wordpress/wp-plurk
0.1.description:
WP-Plurk is a plugin to put a post to your Plurk account everytime you publish a blog post. All you have to do is setup this plugin, enter your username and plurk password and a post template.

About Post Template

The post template has a certain format 1. Plurk qualifier (verbs) must be in the first of the template closed with square bracket. Examples: [shares] or [says]

  1. There are other tags, title and url, title will be replaced with your wordpress post title and url replaced with the permalink. Tags is encloded by double bracket. Example: {{title}} or {{url}}

So to post plurk using shares qualifier we can use template [shares] {{url}} {{title}}
